sudo nano /etc/hosts

1. set your hosts file to use kong for everything. Also add this line 63.252.33.200  signin-qa.brightcove.com
2. restart your browser and maybe flush your hosts (on the mac its dscacheutil -flushcache)
3. go to http://register.brightcove.com/app-cloud/ and create a new account
4. now you're logged into qa.
5. remove kong info from your hosts but keep 63.252.33.200  signin-qa.brightcove.com
6. Any time you want to hit qa, just hit https://katama-qa.brightcove.com

password joejoe
